Macro.fedFundsRateTooltip: This rate influences borrowing costs across the economy. Higher rates (hawkish) aim to slow inflation but can hurt stocks & crypto. Lower rates (dovish) stimulate growth but may increase inflation.
Macro.cpiTooltip: Measures the average change in prices paid by consumers. The Fed reacts to high CPI by raising rates (hawkish), which is negative for risk assets.
Macro.m2Tooltip: Represents the total amount of money in circulation. A rapid increase can signal future inflationary conditions, prompting the Fed to tighten policy. A decrease in M2 is deflationary.
Macro.recessionProbTooltip: Uses the yield curve to predict the probability of a U.S. recession within the next 12 months. A high probability leads to investor risk-off sentiment, negatively impacting crypto.
Macro.correlationDescription: Measures how closely Bitcoin's price movement tracks the S&P 500 index.
Macro.interestRateDescription: Federal funds effective rate over the last 24 months.
Macro.dotPlotDescription: Each dot represents a Fed member's projection for the federal funds rate.

Crypto.btcPriceTooltip: The current price of Bitcoin. Its movement influences the entire crypto market.
Crypto.ethPriceTooltip: The current price of Ethereum, the second-largest crypto by market cap and a major platform for decentralized applications.
Crypto.fearAndGreedTooltip: Measures market sentiment (0 = Extreme Fear, 100 = Extreme Greed). Can be a contrarian indicator that the market is due for a correction.
Crypto.totalMarketCapTooltip: The total value of all cryptocurrencies. It's an indicator of the industry's overall health and growth.
Crypto.btcDominanceTooltip: Bitcoin's market cap as a percentage of the total crypto market cap. A rising BTC dominance often leads to underperformance for altcoins.
Crypto.ethBtcRatioTooltip: Measures Ethereum's performance against Bitcoin. Traders use it to gauge altcoin market strength. An uptrend suggests an 'alt-season'.
Crypto.total2Tooltip: The total market cap of all cryptocurrencies excluding Bitcoin. Used to gauge the health of the altcoin market.
Crypto.total3Tooltip: The total market cap of all cryptocurrencies excluding Bitcoin and Ethereum. It's a good gauge for smaller-cap altcoin trends.
Crypto.logRegDescription: Visualizing Bitcoin's long-term price cycles and potential tops and bottoms.
Crypto.halvingDescription: Estimated time until the next Bitcoin block reward halving.

DCA.title: DCA Simulator
DCA.runToSeeResults: Run a simulation to see the results.

Optimizer.title: Portfolio Optimizer
Optimizer.description: Find the optimal allocation for your crypto portfolio using Modern Portfolio Theory. Select 2 or more assets.
Optimizer.resultsDescription: Each point represents an optimal portfolio for a given level of risk.
Optimizer.selectAndCalculate: Select assets and calculate to see the efficient frontier.

Alerts.cardDescription: Input a summary of recent economic news to generate relevant policy and market alerts.
Alerts.textareaPlaceholder: e.g., 'The Fed announced a 25 basis point rate hike. CPI data for last month came in higher than expected at 3.5%...'
Alerts.generatedDescription: AI-powered notifications based on your input.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description: Manage your application and display settings.
Settings.themeDescription: Select a light or dark theme for the interface.
Settings.animationsDescription: Enable or disable subtle UI animations.
